text: Ðis synd þa londgemæra to uptune ærest of sæuerne on innan pullæ.
Ondlong pulles þæt to þæra hina gemære.
Ondlong þæs gemæres þæt hit cymð on þone feld a be þan wuda.
Swa sulh & siþe hit gegan mæge þæt hit cyme to þære æc.
Þæt swa forð be þam wuda<../images/tbar.gif>on þæ rugan æc.
Of þære æc on þone aldan hagan.
Ondlong hagan þæt on þa lhydan.
Onlong lhydan up onlong alre on þone æcergeard.
A be þæm gearde þæt on þa won ac þæt swa on secmor þæt þet dic to sceot<../images/tbar.gif>.
Þonon on gerihte on eowrhyc þæt swa on fulan mor.
Of þæm more on rinnan pul.
Ondlong broces þæt on sciran pul.
Forð on gerihte ofer þæt pul to þan hagan on gerihte.
On þone hagan ondlong þæs hagan on sæfern.
Ondlong sæfern þæt eft to innan pulle.
And IIItene æceras on easthalue sæfern.

Þonne is ealles þæs landes VI hida þe Osold bisceop bocað Kynelme his þegne mid his hlafordes leafe þreora manna dæg on þa gerad weorce, þæt he weorce<../images/tbar.gif>þæt land seo into þære halgan stowe unforworht.
